LINK_DESC_INSTALLATION.en: Get started with Turborepo in a few moments using
LINK_DESC_INSTALLATION.ko: 몇 분 만에 Turborepo를 시작하는 방법을 확인하세요.

LINK_DESC_CRAFTING.en: Architecting a monorepo is a careful process.

LINK_DESC_ADD_REPOS.en: Turborepo can be incrementally adopted in any repository, single or multi-package, to speed up the developer and CI workflows of the repository.
LINK_DESC_ADD_REPOS.ko: Turborepo는 단일/다중 패키지 어떤 리포지토리에도 점진적으로 도입해 개발/CI 워크플로를 빠르게 할 수 있습니다.

VALIDATION_NO_FIELDS.en: At least one field must be provided.

LINK_NOT_FOUND.en: The requested link was not found.

INVALID_ID.en: The id must be a valid number.

LINKS_EMPTY.en: No links available. Make sure the NestJS API is running on port 3000.
LINKS_EMPTY.ko: 링크가 없습니다. NestJS API가 3000 포트에서 실행 중인지 확인하세요.
